nodes.text: Smoke powder was a substance used by the Dulok shaman Umwak to fill an area with sight-obscuring powder and allow him to operate unseen. Umwak used smoke powder to keep the Ewoks Teebo and Wicket W. Warrick from seeing him steal a potion from the Ewok shaman Logray's hut in Bright Tree Village when the Dulok was impersonating a Tulgah trader.
